powerconsumption: Max. 9 W, max.12 W with IR on, max. 24 W with heater & fan on
imagesettings: Saturation, brightness, contrast adjustable through client software or web browser
communicationinterface: 1 RJ45 10M / 100M ethernet interface, 1 Vp-p composite output (75 O/RCA), Built-in Micro SD card slot up to 32 GB
alarmtrigger: Motion detection, tampering alarm, network disconnect , IP address conflict, storage exception
daynight: IR cut filter with auto switch
label0: 1/3" 2 MegaPixel, 2.7~9mm Motorized Vari-focal, IR=90FT, PoE, IP66
protocols: TCP/IP, HTTP, DHCP, DNS, DDNS, RTP, RTSP, PPPoE, SMTP, NTP, SNMP, HTTPS, FTP, 802.1x, Qos (SIP, SRTP, IPv6 optional)
